extendedIngredients.name: brown rice
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 cups steamed brown or white rice (about 1 1/2 cups uncooked)

extendedIngredients.name: canned black beans
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 cans (14 oz) beans, drained and rinsed (black, kidney, navy and cannelini work well)
metaInformation: drained and rinsed (, kidney, navy and cannelini work well)

extendedIngredients.name: canned tomatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes (or 3 fresh tomatoes, diced)

extendedIngredients.name: hot sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: Cayenne pepper or hot sauce, to taste (optional, adds spice)

extendedIngredients.name: patty pan squash
extendedIngredients.originalString: large saute pan with high sides

extendedIngredients.name: vegetable oil
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 tbsp olive oil or vegetable oil

extendedIngredients.name: zucchini
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 lb. zucchini (about 3 medium zucchini), cut into chunks

recipes.title: Garden Vegetable Medley
recipes.instructions: Save RecipePrint Recipe                          Garden Vegetable Medley                                        Ingredients2 tbsp olive oil or vegetable oil1 onion, chopped2 cloves garlic, minced1 lb. zucchini (about 3 medium zucchini), cut into chunks1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes (or 3 fresh tomatoes, diced)2 cans (14 oz) beans, drained and rinsed (black, kidney, navy and cannelini work well)1/4 cup fresh chopped cilantroSalt and pepper, to tasteCayenne pepper or hot sauce, to taste (optional, adds spice)3 cups steamed brown or white rice (about 1 1/2 cups uncooked)Shredded cheddar cheese for topping (optional)You will also needlarge saute pan with high sides                                Prep Time: 10 Minutes            Cook Time: 25 Minutes            Total Time: 35 Minutes          Servings: 6 servings          Kosher Key: Pareve (Dairy with cheese topping)

steps.step: Ingredients2 tbsp olive oil or vegetable oil1 onion, chopped2 cloves garlic, minced1 lb. zucchini (about 3 medium zucchini), cut into chunks1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes (or 3 fresh tomatoes, diced)2 cans (14 oz) beans, drained and rinsed (black, kidney, navy and cannelini work well)1/4 cup fresh chopped cilantro

Cayenne pepper or hot sauce, to taste (optional, adds spice)3 cups steamed brown or white rice (about 1 1/2 cups uncooked)Shredded cheddar cheese for topping (optional)You will also needlarge saute pan with high sides
Kosher Key: Pareve (Dairy with cheese topping)
